H0.text: Which knight is with Arthur at the end and throws Excalibur into the lake. Sir Bedivere

H1.text: Which knight is with Arthur at the end and throws Excalibur into the lake. Sir Lancelot

H2.text: Which knight is with Arthur at the end and throws Excalibur into the lake. Sir Gawain

H3.text: Which knight is with Arthur at the end and throws Excalibur into the lake. Bewyr

A4.text: Bedivere casts away the sword Excalibur that Arthur had received from the Lady of the Lake.

A5.text: In John Boorman's 1981 film Excalibur, Percival replaces Bedivere as the knight that returns the sword to the Lady of the Lake.

A6.text: Griflet cast Excalibur into a nearby lake
